name: truffle-template
description: This repository acts as boilerplate code for new truffle projects.
author: DeFiFoFum

scripts.test: yarn run compile && yarn mocha --exit --timeout 10000 && npm run coverage && rm -rf ./coverage && rm -rf ./coverage.json
scripts.verify:bsc: truffle run verify VaultApe --network bsc && truffle run verify StrategyMasterChefSingleFactory --network bsc && truffle run verify StrategyMasterApeSingleFactory --network bsc && truffle run verify StrategyKoalaFarmFactory --network bsc && truffle run verify StrategyMasterChefFactory --network bsc && truffle run verify StrategyKoalaChefSingleFactory --network bsc
scripts.verify:polygon: truffle run verify VaultApe --network polygon && truffle run verify StrategyMasterChefSingleFactory --network polygon && truffle run verify StrategyMasterApeSingleFactory --network polygon && truffle run verify StrategyKoalaFarmFactory --network polygon && truffle run verify StrategyMasterChefFactory --network polygon && truffle run verify StrategyKoalaChefSingleFactory --network polygon
